messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.

a history student

he was repeatedly rebuffed

the Arkham Witch Trials

purely in the pursuit of his proposed thesis

the Arkham Witch Trials

Why was Anthony Flinders rebuffed by Professor Leiter?
because Leiter was a criminal and forger, and a good judge of character

What can be said about Anthony Flinders' social life at the university?
that he superficially fits in and is a student with an unremarkable academic record, but has underlying unease from those who know him
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can be said about Anthony Flinders' academic record?
that it is unremarkable
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does T Flinders want to achieve by getting the papers?
T Flinders is enthusiastic to secure the papers for his own private purposes.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Will T Flinders help the investigators?
T Flinders will 'help' the investigators—whether they want him to or not.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What motivates Flinders to behave in certain ways?
He's perfectly willing to use violence to achieve his aims, so long as he believes he can get away with it or the reward outweighs the risk.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Flinders's personality like?
A borderline psychotic and certainly delusional
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Flinders willing to do to achieve his aims?
Use violence
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if Flinders is snubbed?
He will balk at open attack for fear of being overpowered or arrested
